Text.Text: The Arctic has more to offer than we initially thought. Explore more and go deeper into the arctic.
The Arctic has more to offer than we initially thought. Explore more and go deeper into the arctic.
Residence for Inuit to keep them warm in the harsh conditions.
Central gathering place for Inuit to meet friends and family.
Inuit use wood to craft a lot of tools. Gathering wood in the surronding forests is important.
Snow goggles are important to hunt in the harsh snowy conditions. The shining sun on the white snow would otherwise burn the eyes after some time.
Inuit need the best tools to hunt animals. They need to hunt to survive in those harsh conditions.
To make their famous palugua bread, they need flour. Gathering roots in the harsh conditions, grinding down the roots to flour.
Central building where all Inuit coastal activity is centralised. Build modules around it to produce all the goods hunted from the seas and then processed to more goods.

Hunting seals, skinning them for seal skins.

Processing bears, skinning them for Bear Fur.
Assembling Qajaks to go hunting on the water.
Snow shoes are needed equipment to go hunting in the snow.
Breeding huskies to pull the sledges.
Making warm parkas to withstand the cold environment of the Arctic.

Large central logistics center from the Inuit with some additional storage capacity.
Special Labrador Tea made from the rare flowers you find in the Arctic.
Ink is important for the Inuit. Using this to add tattoos on their body.

Big large blocks of ice for the ice trade.
Cutting out large ice blocks for the ice trade.
Store the big ice blocks in special ice houses so they are stored in the perfect conditions.
Transport large quantities of ice blocks to all places. Only usable on trade routes, no manual loading or unloading.
Optimise and expand all your mining and ice harvesting businesses in the Arctic.

Finest clothing shop for woman's clothing.
Industrial made soap from whale oil and saltpetre.
Industrial made Industrial Lubricant from whale oil and tallow.
Industrial made Lacquer from whale oil and quartz sand.
Gathering place to be spiritual with nature.
Gathering place to be spiritual with nature.
Preparing and assembling expedition equipment for harsh expeditions.

Extracts helium gas from gas deposits.
Mine diamonds from the mountains of the Arctic.

A pile of stones erected as a memorial or marker.
A wind pole marking the strength of the wind.

Beautify your Arctic islands with unique Arctic ornaments.
Research the mysteries of the Arctic and discover more answers to good kept secrets.
Technicians researching the mysteries of the Arctic.
Technicians researching the mysteries of the Arctic.

Importing canned food is hard. Make it in the Arctic with the local goods.
Making drum instruments made out of fur hides and wood.
An ancient Mammoth preserved as a tribute to the ancestors by the Inuit to boost Inuit food and drink production.
Boost all Inuit cooking and drinking production output on the island.
All Inuit Food and Drinks Production Buildings
A big pile of stones erected as a memorial or marker.
Monumental Inuksuk made by the Inuit to guide fellow inhabitants of the island and impact the Inuit residents.
Boost all Inuit residences on the island.
Monumental Crafting and Coastal Production Statue
Gigantic iceberg carved by the best crafters of the island impacting Inuit crafting buildings.
Boost all Inuit crafting and coastal buildings on the island.
Gigantic Arctic tree spreading out more smaller trees providing more productivity and knowledge for Inuit forest buildings.
Boost all Inuit forest buildings on the island.
Gigantic sledge, qajak and skis tribute for safe coastal hunting and fishing.
Boost all Inuit coastal buildings on the island.
Gigantic monumental structure from the Inuit.
Monumental Crafting and Coastal Production Statue
Harvesting fresh seaweed from the sea ready to process in dishes or eat raw or dried.
Shaken drinks served in a goblet or Collins glass filled with crushed ice and decorated with fruit referably dusted with icing sugar.
Sparkling Mint Julep, a blend that fizzes with excitement and tingles your taste buds.
A coffee beverage served cold. It may be prepared either by brewing coffee normally and then serving it over ice or in cold milk or by brewing the coffee cold.
Better more insulated Explorer shelter that rises into the sky.
Hot boiling water right from the earth. Use it wisely and do not burn your fingers or toes.
Delve into the harsh hard earth and bring up sparkly diamonds.
More oil from the Arctic with offshore oil drilling.
Store the oil brought to the mainland waiting to be shipped to other regions.
Build production areas on the shores of the river to harvest ice.
Build production areas on the shores of the river to harvest ice.
Mine precious silver ore from the Arctic mountains.
Old Nate always amazes with his inventions. Charge the battery with whale oil power for better heating.
Old Nate keeps amazing people with his inventions. Charge the battery even better with arctic gas power for better heating.
Vladimir Slafofski, Diamonds are everyone's best friend
Vlad goes the extra mile to give the garments and jewelery the extra bling.
Produce soap the Inuit way from Whale Oil.
Providing husky sleds for the people.
Passed on way from generation to generation of making ropes based on seal skin.
The ultimate oil extractor for extreme Arctic Oil drilling.
Improve your Arctic Oil drilling with this state of the art oil sucking machine.
Improve your general arctic drilling with this state of the art portable drilling machine.
Making sure all Inuit are staying healthy.
Shamans throatsinging, preparing for curing people...
Load and unload strategic goods here. Strategic goods are goods only be possible to transport with special ships.
Public Service Building where the citizen can relax and get warm.
Public Service Building where the upgraded citizen can enjoy some time off and have a drink.
Public Service Building where the upgraded citizen can enjoy some time off in the company of people providing entertainment.
